description: Interested in Health Improvement, Research, making a positive change in the NHS.  Assistant Director NIHR Applied Research Collaboration Northwest London & Deputy Director of the Ethnicty & Health Unit. Outside work kids football coach and part-time runner

The NIHR Applied Research Collaboration (ARC) Northwest London is one of 15 @nihrarcs.bsky.social funded by the National Institute for Health and Care Research (@nihr.bsky.social). We work with local partners in Northwest London on applied health and care.
